name: Kids Station: LEGO no Sekai
overview: Kids Station Lego no Sekai is a educational game that uses an animal world made of Lego pieces to teach young kids about numbers, letters, shapes and other intellectual training mini games. The game uses different kind of animals like: panda, elephant, monkeys, pony, etc to explain and do each mini game. This is one of the few Kids Station games that doesn't come with the Kids Station controller in any release. Manufacturer's description: Educational software "Kids Station" series, and toy blocks "LEGO" had released this game. LEGO colorful 3D world to explore the shape and the number of characters that contain elements such as mini-games to enjoy intellectual training. Change and contents of the difficulty in so many times you can enjoy it. They will block a cute character, so that children and adults together is just fun to see. Ready to enjoy. Features: •Third person perspective. •2D graphics •Cartoon graphics •Animals & Fantasy themes.
